me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.impl
Class UnpooledSMTPSClient

java.lang.Object
  me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.impl.UnpooledSMTPClient
      me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.impl.UnpooledSMTPSClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelLocalSupport, SMTPClient
public class UnpooledSMTPSClient
extends UnpooledSMTPClient

SMTPClient implementation which will create a new Connection for every UnpooledSMTPClient.deliver(InetSocketAddress, String, List, InputStream, SMTPClientConfig) call and use SMTPS for the delivery So no pooling is active

Author:
Norman Maurer
